title: Is Captain Gangplain going to be handed out on the 10th, or immediately after playing a game?
body: I just want to clarify whether or not I should be 'worried' about not having it yet, or if I just need to wait.

replies.body: He'll be handed out after the end.
if i played team builder with new gp before he got kilt ( kilt is an inside joke) I'm already set for the skin right????
As long as you own him by the end of the event, you're good to go! :]
Awesome, thanks. Guess I'll keep repping Drachma-plank in the meanwhile!
they havent stated when they'd give him out, but you need to play him before the 10th, so i would assume some time after that!
